Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-49083 affecting package python-cryptography for versions less than 42.0.5-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-49083 affecting package python-cryptography for versions less than 42.0.5-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-cryptography is earlier than 42.0.5-1, affected by CVE-2023-49083
